        public Raster()
        Creates an empty raster

      • Raster

        public Raster(double cellsize,
      double xll,
      double yll)
        Creates a raster from the given data
        Parameters:
        cellsize - - the cellsize of the data
        xll - - the lower left x coordinate of the data
        yll - - the lower left y coordinate of the data

      • Raster

        public Raster(double cellsize,
      double xll,
      double yll,
      int numRows,
      int numCols)
        Creates a raster from the given data
        Parameters:
        cellsize - - the cellsize of the data
        xll - - the lower left x coordinate of the data
        yll - - the lower left y coordinate of the data
        numRows - - the number of rows in the raster
        numCols - = the number of columns in the raster

      • Raster

        public Raster(int minX,
      int minY,
      int maxX,
      int maxY)
        Creates a raster from the given data using the dimensions provided and a cell size of 1.
        Parameters:
        minX - - the minimum x (horizontal) coordinate
        minY - - the minimum y (vertical) coordinate
        maxX - - the maximum x (horizontal) coordinate
        maxY - - the maximum y (vertical) coordinate

      • getXYValue

        public double getXYValue(int x,
                int y)
        Returns the value at the given XY coordinate, assuming that x is relative to Xll and y is relative to Yll
        Parameters:
        x - - the x co-ordinate of the desired value
        y - - the y co-ordinate of the desired value
        Returns:
        - the raster value at the given coordinate pair.

      • init

        public void init(Raster other)
        Sets the parameters of this raster (rows, columns, corner, cellsize, NDATA etc) to be the same as the other raster. This includes initialising the data array with NDATAs
        Parameters:
        other -
